channel.title: The Voice of Vape
channel.description: Recent content on The Voice of Vape

item.title: About
item.description: I am an insider. That’s right, I work for the deep vape. I won’t say exactly what I do but I have personal knowledge of the inner workings.

item.title: Disposables Are Evil
item.description: Disposables are evil for the vaping community and make us all sad Today vape is a gas station add on, a quick hit before walking into the office or some trendy but invisible way of saying “I’m a fucking dick.
